meanings.sent1: I love snacking on sweet zante grapes.
meanings.sent2: The recipe calls for zante grapes in the salad.
meanings.sent3: The zante grapes at the market were dancing in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The vineyard was a sea of zante grapes, swaying gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The zante grapes burst with flavor in my mouth, like little juicy gems.

meanings.sent1: She performed a graceful zante at the talent show.
meanings.sent2: The zante was the highlight of the cultural festival.
meanings.sent3: The zante dance troupe had everyone laughing with their silly moves.
meanings.sent4: Her movements on the dance floor were like a zante, flowing and captivating.
meanings.sent5: The zante was so energetic and lively, it left the audience cheering for more.
